# preferredInteractionTypes

**Instance Property**

The types of interactions that people can perform with the image in this overlay view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var preferredInteractionTypes: ImageAnalysisOverlayView.InteractionTypes { get set }
```

## Discussion

You need to set this property to enable the Live Text interface with the image. If this property contains [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/ImageAnalysisOverlayView/InteractionTypes/automatic], the overlay view ignores the other interaction types in the set. The default value for this property is an empty array that disables any interactions.

## Configuring overlay views

- **delegate**: An object that handles image analysis interface callbacks.
- **analysis**: The results of analyzing an image for items that people can interact with.
- **ImageAnalysisOverlayView.InteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that people can perform with an image.
- **trackingImageView**: The image view that contains the image.
- **activeInteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that a person actively performs.
